resources.string: Everyone can participate on this road adventure exploring Svetvinčenat. Just go to the coin location on the Svetvinčenat map and take a picture. After successful photoshoot, the coin will be placed inside your stack. You can choose between 7 cycling and hiking routes, but only the bravest one who collects all 9 coins and in that way saves milady Grimani will be rewarded. Visit Svetvinčenat Tourist board on the main square and pick up your gift!

Welcome to Svetvinčenat adventure! In this extraordinary story, following the paths of milady Grimani, you\'ll be taken through mysterious roads and magical forests of Svetvinčenat. Collect coins, have fun and save her from the nameless rider who took her from the Castle Morosini Grimani. By passing all tasks, meet us at the Svetvinčenat Tourist board where you\'ll be rewarded for your courage! Good luck!
